rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses the moderate verb 'has also been detected', lacking high-potency framing.
Contains scale (locations/types of farms) but no moderate verb describing impact.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports detections (negative facts) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports detection at various locations ('commercial turkey farms', 'flock', 'backyard flock'), factually reporting locations/counts.
